content: Throughout the same period, our capital intensity has come down and will come down further in the future, which will continue fueling free cash flow growth. Between 2019 and 2022, we generated cumulative free cash flow of â¬18 billion, which allow us to reduce debt over this period by â¬11 billion and to improve shareholders' equity as much as 46% higher than in 2019. Our focus strategy drives performance and better outcomes, and ultimately allow us to remunerate our shareholders to whom we have devoted more than â¬9 billion since 2019.
